trans-unit.source: System for ordering and managing smart fridge devices and food suppliers for them. Stay smart even having lunch!

A cutting-edge IT company, dedicated to providing solutions that empower businesses. Specializes in IT consulting, software development, and more, guiding its clients toward limitless technological possibilities

A consulting firm known for its expertise in guiding military tech companiest to success in the Ukrainian market. With a deep understanding of local dynamics and a track record of delivering winning strategies, the company is a trusted partner for achieving growth and prosperity.

The designer reative agency renowned for its innovative design solutions. The team specializes in crafting visually stunning and impactful designs that captivate audiences and leave a lasting impression.

Volunteer project for fast volunteer help delivery in Kharkiv, Ukraine, that is aimed to help the soldiers on the frontline, the defence forces in the city, the injured defenders in hospitals and the citizens, that need support.
One-stop solution for fast-food essentials, delivering quality ingredients to keep customers coming back for more.
A fast-casual cafe, dedicated to serving up delectable on-the-go meals that satisfy your cravings in no time.
Their perfect burgers, hot dogs or sandwiches, made of top-notch ingredients, are ensuring mouthwatering fast-food experiences.
Pizza restourant, that will definetly save you from hunger with its delicious pizza. They serve Italy in every bite.

We are the providers of System for ordering and managing smart fridge devices and food suppliers for them. We are here to connect office owners and food suppliers to make a lunch for the client company empoloyees just a choose office -> choose dish -> pick it up from the _ fridge -> enjoy!

If you are a company owner - you leave a request for fridges installation, choose the food suppliers and that`s it! Any other troubles are no longer your concern. If you are a food supplier - you choose the fridges you want to deliver dishes to, wait for the fridge owner company approval of your menu and start delivering! You will receive the payments for each dish taken, the messages about dishes left amount and the menu statistics to improve your service and enlarge profit.

We are here to provide a smart lunches for your coworkers. They will no longer need to leave office to have lunch, your delivery system will be automatized. Fill the fridge in your space and make an order in a few clicks and do not worry about thesupport - we take this responsibility.
We are already providing our services for:
